---
applyTo: "**"
---

1. Always work off a feature branch and never code directly in the `main` branch.
2. Code separation of concerns is important. Ensure that different functionalities are modularized into separate files or classes.
3. Use MCP tool langchain-docs when asked about or coding for LangChain, Langgraph or deep agents.
4. Use MCP tool github when performing actions related to GitHub repositories or workflows.
